0.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔站在高处，紧了紧身上的皮毛斗篷，目光坚定地眺望着远处蜿蜒的山脉。</action>
<parenthetical>(坚定而警觉)</parenthetical>
<dialogue></dialogue>
</detailed_performance>

3.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔转过头，脸上露出一抹微笑。</action>
<parenthetical>(微微一笑，轻声地说)</parenthetical>
<dialogue>只是在想南方的事情。</dialogue>
</detailed_performance>

5.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔轻轻地点头，眼中闪过一丝理解的光芒。</action>
<parenthetical>(带着一丝沉思)</parenthetical>
<dialogue></dialogue>
</detailed_performance>

7.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔心中感到一丝温暖，缓缓地点了点头。</action>
<parenthetical>(带着一丝感动)</parenthetical>
<dialogue></dialogue>
</detailed_performance>

9.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔的心猛地一沉，他迅速转向老琼斯，眼神中透露出前所未有的坚定。</action>
<parenthetical>(坚定地, 对老琼斯)</parenthetical>
<dialogue>我们需要组织起来，准备出发。我们必须帮助他们。</dialogue>
</detailed_performance>

11.威尔:
<detailed_performance>
<character>威尔</character>
<action>威尔深吸一口气，坚定地转身朝村庄的方向走去。</action>
<parenthetical></parenthetical>
<dialogue></dialogue>
</detailed_performance>
